Darkhawk Quickly moves and  shot a paralizing dart against R=
attrap "That's true little rodent" said the Predacon "You have a bigger mou=
nt"


From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, February 22, 2010 10:43 PM
To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
While insid=
e Tucsons' helmet, Rat Trap quickly delivers a shot of concentrated Energon=
 via a fine needle. He knew he had to wake up the Autobot in a hurry, and t=
his was the only way he knew how.

"Sorry Wheels, gotta do this."

With the=
 injection Tucson gasps for air and comes back online. The jolt is enough t=
o return his energy levels to a reasonable percentage, but not enough to un=
freeze his body. He could feel Rat Trap in his helmet, yet he sensed that h=
e was a friend. He remains quiet.

"And - what the slag do you expect - to =
get out of me? Ever - hear of the - term, Classified information? Well, tha=
t's what my information is. Classified."

He says in a cold tone of voice t=
o Zarak. His optics narrow fiercely.
He was not through fighting yet. Rat T=
rap gathers a bit of courage and comes out from inside his helmet.quickly m=
ove

"Rat Trap Maximize!"

He transforms into Maximal form right in front o=
f Zarak.

" That's right lizard lips! He don't have ta tell you slag! And k=
now somethn' else?! He's got more courage than all of you uglies put tageth=
er! He's fightn' this battle all by himself, versus you guys who have ta ke=
ep backn' each other up! AND THAT GOES FOR THE FORMER AHEM, NOW ABSCENT ROD=
IMUS PRIME! GAG ME! HE AIN'T NEVER GONNA HOLD A CANDLE UP TA OPTIMUS PRIME,=
 EVER!"

Tucson gasps.

"Rat - Trap, be - careful."

Rat Trap grunts.

" It=
's true wheels! If anyone should lead the Autobots, it's you! You got the h=
eart, the spark, the courage, the strength, the compassion, and the will ta=
 fight! No matter what came down the pike! "

Tucson sighs.

"My - name is =
Tucson."

Rat Trap now stands in front of Tucson.

"Not for long it ain't g=
onna be. You got the spark of Optimus Prime, you're it, you're the bot! EAT=
 THIS RODDIE! LONG LIVE TUCSON PRIME!"

Tucson gasps again in shock.

"Rat =
Trap, please, watch your words."

Rat Trap shrugs.

"Couldn't help myself, =
I got a big mouth for a little rat."

s that was for us I think that the right pronoun is he... He must be observ=
ed in a discrete way, i wont let him go close to the Ark, the slightes tamp=
ering in the wrong way and all is doomed, and we dont know a lot about Scou=
rge and Cyclonus; I'll insist Hydras, that let us go me and Darkhawk but I =
need someone watching Zarak, but that would be after we get all the info th=
at we can from that Auto-fool "

 of his guns and aimed carfully, ready for all.

clonus

com

you, Zarak, that you and Jiaxus are our guest
> >in the BlackFortess" said =
coldyPerceptor "and not the Master of the house, so
> >remember where is yo=
ur place; Darkhawk, take this... Patetic bot to the

, you and Zarak take every piece of information that
> >coudl be usefull, e=
ven if that means to use painful means; when you have a good
> >amount of i=
nformation we can go to take the matrix...
> 
> (SNIP)
> 
> Zarak straighte=
ned, crossing his arms over his chest as he coolly looked at Perceptor. "Of=
 course" he said, the look on his face a cold blank mask, revealing nothing=
 of the inner turmoil he was dealing with. There was a part of him that wan=
ted to blast the little Predacon for daring to tell him anything. But the u=
gly thing was that Zarak still needed the extra forces that Hydras and his =
Predacons brought to the table.
> 
> So rather than commanding his Scorpono=
k unit to open fire on the base he just nodded and said, "I apologize, I ha=
ve overstepped my place."
> 
> Meanwhile Cyclonus and Scourge continued to =
face down Dark Rodimus, the air was tense as Dark Rodimus' optics stared in=
to Cyclonus, niether of them ready to back down, both of them remembering t=
he last battle they fought!
> 
> However it was Perceptor that broke the de=
adlock as he continued giving orders . . . 
> 
> (PASTE)
> 
> > The rest, w=
e have to Keep an eye in maximal base things are becoming
> > interesting l=
ately there, Rodimus... I need you for task"
> 
> The affect of the command=
 was almost instant as Rodimus stepped back from Cyclonus and Scourge and l=
ooked over at Perceptor. "What'cha need Percy?" Rodimus said to Perceptor, =
happy for the moment that it was Perceptor and Hydras giving orders and not=
 Cyclonus and his lap dog.
> 
> Cyclonus, seeing the break in the tension a=
lso stepped back, pulling Scourge back with him. "There will be another tim=
e Scourge." he said quietly, "No need to fight this out here."
> 
> Scourge=
 nodded, "Yes, there will be." he said darkly. His optics still watched Rod=
imus, his look almost hungry as he smiled evilly.
> 
> As the tensions betw=
een Cyclonus, Scourge and Rodimus cooled Zarak turned to look at Tuscon, wo=
ndering what information this bot could hold. "Come" Zarak said to Darkhawk=
, "Let's see what this Auto . . . "
> 
> *BEEP*
> 
> Zarak was caught in mi=
d sentence by his scanner going off, the hand held one that he had been kee=
ping trained on Tuscon. He glanced down at it, a curious look on his face. =
For some reason it was registering a life sign where there had been none be=
fore. It was located somewhere near Tuscon's head.
> 
> Zarak stepped forwa=
rd to take a more careful scan . . .
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> OOC: Yup, the same sca=
nner he had been scanning him with a few posts ago. It is still out and pro=
cessing :)
